comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
This one will have to wait until 4.0, because the AuthSSLProtocolSocketFactory
class makes use of Java 1.4 specific interfaces

Oleg

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body: AuthSSLProtocolSocketFactory moved to the HttpConn module of the HttpClient project

description:
Include the functionality of the AuthSSLProtocolSocketFactory class into the
main distribution of HttpClient

http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/httpclient/trunk/src/contrib/org/apache/commons/httpclient/contrib/ssl/
